pullrequest.title: Support multiple xunit files with same name

content.raw:
I think we can change that in the test plugin configuration. Currently we have `build/test_results/*.xml`, I'm trying `build/test_results/*.xml*` here:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_crystal-bionic-amd64](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64))
